multiple.question: Which of the following is the most correct method for writing the number and metric unit?
Which statement best describes the relationship between a centimeter and a meter?

answers.answer: A meter is smaller than a centimeter.
There are 100 centimeters in a meter.
A centimeter and a meter are the same thing.

multiple.question: Which unit would be most appropriate for measuring a large jug of milk?
Which unit would be best to measure the length of this truck?
Which unit of measure would be best to use to measure the mass of an elephant?
The centimeter is the best unit for measuring the distance between Chicago and Los Angeles.
One advantage of the metric system is that decimals are easily used with the system.
The meter is smaller than the length of a football field.
In the metric system, you can use either capital letters or lowercase letters as a symbol for any unit of measurement.
The gram is the best unit to use when measuring the volume of substance.
